StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000><snd:Greeting><clr:ffff>To get to <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks Stable<clr:ffff>, you'd
usually cross the <clr:0000>bridge <clr:ffff>here.

I'm sorry to say it's been destroyed.
Something...fell on top of it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>There are disaster measures in place, but
they're far from perfect. Be extra careful
if you try to cross through there.
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>A massive hole—indeed, a <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff>—has
opened in the <clr:0000>outpost<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>.

As if that weren't enough, they say the
area near the <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff> is filled with this
creepy haze called <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>If you touch that, it's all over! It will sap
your strength in an instant, and leave
you listless...<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>A hole and haze...<sp:5:1:0> If it wasn't part of my
job on the <clr:0000>survey team<clr:ffff> to investigate
such things, I'd never go near that.
GoRange_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:0000><snd:TalkPositive><clr:ffff>I hear there's a <clr:0000>chasm <clr:ffff>near <clr:0000>Proxim Bridge<clr:ffff>
that's so deep, it goes down to the depths
of the earth.
Careful near there. <sp:5:1:0>If you fall in, that's a
one-way ticket to the afterlife.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>That enemy was a bit difficult. I'm glad
you came to help.
RestPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>I'd like to get a good night's sleep in an
<clr:0000>inn<clr:ffff>'s bed every now and again.

It'd get rid of all my fatigue in one go!
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Thanks! You're really strong. You must
work out a lot, huh?
RestPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>Me on the other hand, I'm exhausted...
Researching the Zonai sure is tiring.<sp:5:1:0>

To tell you the truth, I'd rather crawl into
a soft bed than rest in a place like this.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><clr:0000><snd:LaughS><clr:ffff>When you sleep in an <clr:0000>inn<clr:ffff>'s bed, you wake
up one hundred times more energetic!
Far more refreshed!
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>You've got to cross a bridge to get to
<clr:0000>Dueling Peaks Stable <clr:ffff>to the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>.
Well, normally.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
The bridge has been destroyed by <clr:0000>ruins<clr:ffff>
that fell from the sky.

That would have been fine...if it'd been
the ruins of a bridge.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>I doubt anyone would willingly approach
the <clr:0000>outpost<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff> of here.

It's not just the hole—that huge, creepy
<clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff>. The area is also full of that
troubling <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
Greeting_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You must have a lot of energy if you can
go all night without any rest.
Greeting_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>What is it?<sp:5:1:0> You sure seem enthusiastic
about something.
Greeting_02: Are you headed that way too, buddy?
Greeting_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You must have a lot of energy, tromping
around in the rain without a care.
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>I wonder why the <clr:0000>mechanical figures <clr:ffff>are
at odds with the <clr:0000>monsters<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:1:0>

They can't be fighting over food, after all.
Atacked01: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Thanks! You came at just the right time!
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:0000><snd:TalkPositive><clr:ffff>This <clr:0000>bridge<clr:ffff> to <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks Stable<clr:ffff> has
been destroyed. So, take care if you plan
on crossing.
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Scare>Too dangerous for me, no matter how
you slice it. <sp:5:0:0>How would you even fight
something like that?!
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Sad_00>Really...<sp:5:0:0> If you were right here, you could
have protected me.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>You've got some skills! I'd ask you to be
my bodyguard if I could!
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_01>Phew...<sp:5:0:0> I thought that was it for me.<sp:5:1:0> I'm
lucky to even be alive.
Thanks00: <sp:3:0:2:0100>Here's a token of my gratitude! Take this.
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting>Thanks! I would've been in real trouble
without you. I don't even have a weapon!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease>That was pretty close just now.<sp:5:0:0> I'd have
been done for if not for your help!
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>There have been sightings of strange,
<clr:0000>mechanical figures<clr:ffff> near the <clr:0000>ruins<clr:ffff> that fell
nearby. What are those guys, really...<sp:5:0:0>
You should be careful around here.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Thanks! I hope you'll help me out if we
meet like this in the future!
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You can find <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks Stable<clr:ffff> to the
<clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>, but unfortunately the bridge near
there has been destroyed.
What's more, they say it's because of
<clr:0000>ruins <clr:ffff>that fell from the sky!

<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>What are the odds? This is such a vast
land, and it fell on the bridge?!
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>Ugh, this rain... <sp:5:0:0>What bad luck.<sp:0:4:0>It'd be rough if lightning hit, so maybe I'll
just take shelter from the rain and see if
this clears up a little.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>There are lots of <clr:0000>ruins<clr:ffff> that fell from the
sky scattered around this area.

And there have been strange sightings of
<clr:0000>mechanical figures<clr:ffff> just kind of hanging
around these <clr:0000>ruins<clr:ffff>...
Just what are those guys? Be cautious if
you go near any of them.
Near_GoRange_03: Got to be quite a hole...
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I was in the mood to really put in some
good work today too.

Of course, that's when the rain would
start pouring. <sp:5:1:0>Maybe it's a sign to stick
to what I'm good at?
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_01>I'd rather not get done in by lightning, so
I'll just take shelter from the rain and see
how the weather goes.
GoRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I'm told that there's a massive, deep
<clr:0000>chasm <clr:ffff>on the other side of <clr:0000>Proxim Bridge<clr:ffff>.

From what I hear, it's so deep, it goes all
the way to the depths of the earth.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Well, it's possible that's an exaggeration.
Or is that...<sp:5:1:0>an excavation?

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Either way, be careful if you go near that
<clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff>. You wouldn't want to fall in!
BackRange_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>I hear there's a <clr:0000>chasm <clr:ffff>at the <clr:0000>outpost
ruins <clr:ffff>to the<clr:0000> west<clr:ffff> that's so massive, it
stretches into the depths of the earth.
Don't fall into that. Be careful if you go
anywhere near there.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>The <clr:0000>bridge<clr:ffff> to <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks Stable <clr:ffff>was
destroyed by <clr:0000>ruins<clr:ffff> that fell from the sky.

They say that disaster measures have
been put into effect, but still, be careful
near there.
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Looking for <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks Stable<clr:ffff>?
I should tell you about something
serious that's happened there.
Some <clr:0000>ruins<clr:ffff> fell from the sky, and they
landed right on top of the <clr:0000>bridge<clr:ffff> that
crosses to the stable!<sp:5:1:0>
The <clr:0000>bridge<clr:ffff> has been...destroyed.<sp:0:4:0>Disaster measures have been put into
effect near there, but it's not completely
safe,<sp:5:0:0> so be careful.
Greeting:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Morning.<sp:5:1:0> You're looking bright-eyed
and bushy-tailed, if I may say so.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>There are <clr:0000>mechanical figures<clr:ffff> just hanging
around the <clr:0000>ruins<clr:ffff> that fell from the sky.
Very strange.
Even stranger, they don't seem to get
along with monsters. <sp:5:0:0>They're fighting with
each other all over the place.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>If I encounter that, I wonder if I could
figure out some way to get them to finish
each other off?
That'd certainly make my work easier.
BackRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You should stay here, and steer clear of
the <clr:0000>outpost ruins<clr:ffff> to the<clr:0000> west<clr:ffff>.

A massive <clr:0000>chasm <clr:ffff>opened up near there,<sp:5:0:0>
and it's apparently so deep, it stretches
into the depths of the earth.
If you fell in, that'd be curtains for you!<sp:5:1:0>
Seriously, you want no part of that.
